title: foxglove.LocationFix
description: A navigation satellite fix for any Global Navigation Satellite System

frame_id.description: Frame for the sensor. Latitude and longitude readings are at the origin of the frame.

position_covariance.description: Position covariance (m^2) defined relative to a tangential plane through the reported position. The components are East, North, and Up (ENU), in row-major order.

position_covariance_type.title: foxglove.PositionCovarianceType
position_covariance_type.description: If `position_covariance` is available, `position_covariance_type` must be set to indicate the type of covariance.

oneOf.title: DIAGONAL_KNOWN
oneOf.description: Position covariance is per-axis, so put it along the diagonal

oneOf.title: KNOWN
oneOf.description: Position covariance of the fix is known

color.title: foxglove.Color
color.description: Color used to visualize the location

message_id.description: Unique identifier for this message (e.g., UUID7, ULID, or custom format)

lineage.title: foxglove.LineageInfo
lineage.description: Lineage information for tracking data provenance

items.title: foxglove.InputReference
items.description: Reference to an input message used in lineage tracking

topic.description: Topic name of the input message

message_id.description: Unique identifier of the input message (e.g., UUID7, ULID, or custom format)

inputs.description: References to input messages that contributed to this message

processing_node.description: Name of the processing node that produced this message

state.title: foxglove.StateReference
state.description: Optional reference to the state of the processing node

topic.description: Topic name of the state message

message_id.description: Unique identifier of the state message (e.g., UUID7, ULID, or custom format)
